entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is the person who was tied up by the Death Eater. He is described as being in pain after Hermione cuts him with her wand.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the person who casts the spell 'Petriﬁcus Totalus' to immobilize the Death Eater. She is also described as being shaken and trembling after the explosion.

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: The Death Eaters are a group of people who are enemies of Harry Potter. One of them is described as having a twisted face and casting spells at Harry and his friends.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the person who is standing behind a table when it blows up due to the Death Eater's spell. He feels the force of the explosion and loses his wand.

relationships.description: Hermione casts the spell 'Petriﬁcus Totalus' to immobilize the Death Eater, causing him to fall forward like a statue.
Hermione cuts Ron's knee with her wand using the spell 'Diﬃndo', leaving a deep cut.
